__TOC__
== Notes ==
* The only known stone crafter is at the [[Provisioner]] in [[Minoc|Minoc - The Survival Shop]]. 
* The book [[Carpentry|"Making Valuables With Stonecrafting"]] allows stonecrafting however you must be [[Carpentry|Grandmaster Carpentry(100 skill)]] in order to read this book.
* The book [[Mining|"Mining for Quality Stone"]] will let a miner choose to mine ore or granite by single clicking their pickaxe, you must be [[Mining|Grandmaster Mining(100 skill)]] in order to read this book. 
* The mallet and chisel is the tool used by carpenters for stonecrafting, you must read the [[Carpentry|"Making Valuables With Stonecrafting"]] book before you are able to use the tool.
== Locations ==
[[Minoc|Minoc - The Survival Shop]]
== Merchandise == 
* Same as [[Carpenter]] with additions
* Book [[Carpentry|"Making Valuables With Stonecrafting"]]
* Book [[Mining|"Mining for Quality Stone"]]
* Mallet and chisel
